On the Tasks (Admin, Tagger, Checker View) screen, the following features can be used for task management:

* Multi-Language Support: The Annotation Tool should support multiple languages, so that users can choose the language in which they want to view the tool. The language selection should be available in the user profile, and should apply to all aspects of the tool, including the interface, labels, and definitions.
* Accessibility: The Annotation Tool should be accessible to users with disabilities, such as users who are blind or have low vision, mobility impairments, or cognitive impairments. The tool should be compliant with web accessibility standards, such as WCAG 2.1, and should include features such as high contrast, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support.
* Performance: The Annotation Tool should be fast and responsive, with minimal delays or errors. It should be optimized for performance, such as by using caching, compression, and other optimization techniques. The tool should also be able to handle large volumes of data and users without crashing or slowing down.
